SELECT mst.SEQ_MBR , mst.EMAIL , mst.MBR_NM , mst.GENDER , mst.PHONE , dtl.POST , dtl.ADDR1 , dtl.ADDR2 , dtl.FLG_EMAIL , dtl.FLG_SMS FROM TB_MBR_MST mst INNER JOIN TB_MBR_DTL dtl ON mst.SEQ_MBR = dtl.SEQ_MBR WHERE mst.SEQ_MBR = #{seq_mbr}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MBR_MST (SEQ_MBR, EMAIL, PASSWD, FLG_SUR, CD_STATE, MBR_NM, AGE, GENDER, PHONE, DT_REG, REGISTER) VALUES (#{seq_mbr}, #{email}, #{passwd}, #{flg_sur}, 0, #{mbr_nm}, TO_DATE(#{age}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{gender}, #{phone}, SYSDATE, #{register})
INSERT INTO TB_MBR_DTL (SEQ_MBR, POST, ADDR1, ADDR2, FLG_SMS, FLG_EMAIL, DT_SMS, DT_EMAIL) VALUES (#{seq_mbr}, #{post}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{flg_sms}, #{flg_email}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
